name: SystemSeed
tagline: Strategy Design & Development in Drupal & ReactJS
description:
A focused service provider of Drupal site development, Drupal site support and management, and Drupal training. In a nutshell, SystemSeed is:
Author of 30+ Drupal well used modules
Co-maintainer of countless other Drupal modules
Active contributor to the Drupal community
Expert speaker at global Drupal events
